meanings.definition: An initial visit to a place or location before the main visit.
meanings.sent1: During the previsit, we checked out the museum to plan our main visit.
meanings.sent2: The previsit to the zoo helped us decide which animals to see first.
meanings.sent3: The previsit to the amusement park was like a sneak peek before the big day.
meanings.sent4: Her previsit to the new school felt like stepping into a different world.
meanings.sent5: The previsit to the beach made us excited for the upcoming vacation.

meanings.definition: To visit a place or location before the main visit.
meanings.sent1: We decided to previsit the restaurant to check the menu before our friends arrived.
meanings.sent2: She likes to previsit the park to ensure it's a good spot for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: He previsits the store to avoid the crowds during peak hours.
meanings.sent4: Previsiting the neighborhood helped them feel more comfortable before moving in.
meanings.sent5: They always previsit the campsite to familiarize themselves with the surroundings.
